Text: You're Wonderful! Thanks so much for this. Being a big Bean book fan let me as about a couple of other recent books in case you might have them. Robert Conroy-Rising Sun, and Cordwainer Smith-When the People Fell. Would appreciate those if ya got 'em.
I meant ask, not as in the previous note. And, by the way, do you have any good sources you could share for lately published sci-fi/fantasy books and audio books now that Demonoid is down?

The Robert Conroy book dont come out till Dec. and thats in hardcover...i didnt see anything on amazon about it even being released as an e-book so that might take some time.  The other book i cant find at all, the title and author brings up a 20 page short story by the same name..ill keep looking

The Rising Sun is shown as a new e-book this month, and the Ring of Fire III and When the People Fell are shown as newly published this month on this site:  http://www.baen.com/
Thanks for looking.
